attributes.name: Bondsman's Life Staff
attributes.name_with_affixes: Bondsman's Life Staff of the Sage
attributes.description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."

attributes.name: Bondsman's Longsword
attributes.description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."

attributes.name: Bondsman's Musket
attributes.description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."

attributes.name: Bondsman's Round Shield
attributes.name_with_affixes: Bondsman's Round Shield of the Soldier
attributes.description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."

attributes.name: Bondsman's War Hammer
attributes.name_with_affixes: Bondsman's War Hammer of the Soldier
attributes.description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."

attributes.name: Bonechopper
attributes.description: "The first living thing I killed was a chicken. I was about six or so. My dad gave me his handaxe and told me to get started on dinner."
attributes.parsed_description: "The first living thing I killed was a chicken. I was about six or so. My dad gave me his handaxe and told me to get started on dinner."

attributes.name: Bonecrusher
attributes.description: "Ironically, this deadly Ancient weapon was designed for shattering opponents' bones."
attributes.parsed_description: "Ironically, this deadly Ancient weapon was designed for shattering opponents' bones."

attributes.name: Boneforged Recurve
attributes.description: "The limbs of the bow are made of human bone. And the string feels... fleshy."
attributes.parsed_description: "The limbs of the bow are made of human bone. And the string feels... fleshy."

attributes.name: Boneshatter Animus
attributes.description: "Hostility radiates out from this weapon like rays of light from the sun. Even to hold it to is be infected by anger."
attributes.parsed_description: "Hostility radiates out from this weapon like rays of light from the sun. Even to hold it to is be infected by anger."

attributes.name: Boneshatter's Third Arm
attributes.description: "The ancient Javelineer moved his spear so effortlessly it was like a part of his body."
attributes.parsed_description: "The ancient Javelineer moved his spear so effortlessly it was like a part of his body."

attributes.name: Booming Rifle
attributes.description: "The sound of your shot echoes throughout the land, stirring dormant creatures miles away."
attributes.parsed_description: "The sound of your shot echoes throughout the land, stirring dormant creatures miles away."

attributes.name: Boundless Ward
attributes.description: There is naught that cannot be turned aside.
attributes.parsed_description: There is naught that cannot be turned aside.

attributes.name: Bow of Arcane Sacrifice
attributes.description: "A wizard's test subject met his fate when his soul was absorbed into the strings of this bow. When an arrow is drawn, his screams of pain can still be heard."
attributes.parsed_description: "A wizard's test subject met his fate when his soul was absorbed into the strings of this bow. When an arrow is drawn, his screams of pain can still be heard."

attributes.name: Bow of Dark Rebirth
attributes.description: “Forget what you had before. Let the dark tendrils of corruption give you life anew.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Forget what you had before. Let the dark tendrils of corruption give you life anew.”

attributes.name: Bow of Good Fortune
attributes.description: "How lucky are you to have been shipwrecked on such a peaceful and quiet island."
attributes.parsed_description: "How lucky are you to have been shipwrecked on such a peaceful and quiet island."

attributes.name: Bow of the Crystal Palace
attributes.description: "For decades a king ruled from a palace carved of crystal. His hopes and dreams shattered as his palace crumbled around him, forever entombing him."
attributes.parsed_description: "For decades a king ruled from a palace carved of crystal. His hopes and dreams shattered as his palace crumbled around him, forever entombing him."

attributes.name: Bow of the Dark Ranger
attributes.description: "They saw only a hooded figure with glowing red eyes. The very next moment they found an arrow lodged in their heart."
attributes.parsed_description: "They saw only a hooded figure with glowing red eyes. The very next moment they found an arrow lodged in their heart."

attributes.name: Bow of the Enchantress
attributes.description: "Sing my song and receive my power."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sing my song and receive my power."

attributes.name: Bow of the Shadows
attributes.description: "Do not let the light see what you do in the dark."
attributes.parsed_description: "Do not let the light see what you do in the dark."

attributes.name: Bow of the Woods Demon
attributes.description: "Spriggans are bastardly beings. Not quite the friendly natural spirits you might be used to."
attributes.parsed_description: "Spriggans are bastardly beings. Not quite the friendly natural spirits you might be used to."

attributes.name: Breach Battered Life Staff
attributes.description: "Bruised and broken from several trips through the breaches, this staff has saved more lives than you can count."
attributes.parsed_description: "Bruised and broken from several trips through the breaches, this staff has saved more lives than you can count."

attributes.name: Breach Bloodied Rifle
attributes.description: "Legions of monsters lept forth from the breach. By the time the battle ended I was covered in their remnants."
attributes.parsed_description: "Legions of monsters lept forth from the breach. By the time the battle ended I was covered in their remnants."
